entertainment.name: 静·serene SPA 泰式按摩足疗 (Serene Thai SPA)
entertainment.location: 解放碑环球金融中心四楼 (4F WFC - World Financial Center, Jiefangbei, Minzu Road 188)
entertainment.notes: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED (67 likes, 10 comments on RedNote). Authentic Thai spa in WFC building 4F. Features: 10-20 years experienced therapists, no pushy sales, pre-massage questionnaire for customized experience, complimentary mango sticky rice after session. Beautiful Thai-style decor. Per capita ~100 RMB. Perfect for post-dinner relaxation after walking 20,000 steps. Walk from Linjiangmen Metro (临江门地铁站). Book in advance.

entertainment.name: 观远足道养生 (Guanyuan Zudao Wellness - Jiefangbei)
entertainment.location: 财汇广场B塔 (Caihui Plaza Tower B, near Xiaoshizi Metro Exit 6)
entertainment.notes: HIGHEST RATED ALTERNATIVE (165 likes, 7 comments on RedNote, 4.7 Gaode rating). Cheaper than competitor Gold Impression. 80min basic service. Can stay overnight as budget accommodation. Great food options: beef noodle, Chongqing xiaomian, chicken offal. Self-serve buffet 11:30-14:00 & 17:30-21:00 (+59 RMB). Clean environment, updated movies/TV shows. Holiday note: Book ahead or arrive early. Gaode verified cost: 182 RMB avg.

entertainment.name: KOH Thai SPA 暹罗之屿泰式按摩足疗 (Jiefangbei 2nd Branch)
entertainment.location: 八一路238号八一广场2号门(电梯上6楼) (238 Bayi Road, Bayi Square Gate 2, 6F)
entertainment.notes: Gaode verified. Second branch of Koh Thai in Jiefangbei area. Elevator to 6F. Thai massage specialty. Near Liberation Monument. Alternative if Serene SPA fully booked.

entertainment.name: Making Dumplings Together (包饺子 Bāo Jiǎozi)
entertainment.notes: CORE CNY TRADITION - Visual, hands-on activity requiring minimal Chinese. Dumpling-making is universal across China/Japan/Korea (similar to gyoza/mandu) - perfect conversation bridge for girlfriend's Asian culture interest. Family members demonstrate folding techniques, girlfriend follows visually. Traditionally includes hiding coins/peanuts for good fortune - fun, low-pressure surprise element. User can translate simple instructions ('fold here', 'press edges'). Activity naturally includes passive elders who can demonstrate traditional techniques. Duration: ~60-90 minutes. Creates bonding through shared creation, not forced conversation.

entertainment.name: Preparing Family Photo Album Viewing (家庭相册 Jiātíng Xiàngcè)
entertainment.notes: RESEARCH-BACKED ICEBREAKER - Studies show photo sharing is highly effective for first meetings across language barriers. Girlfriend brings photos of France/family on phone, family shares childhood photos of user + family history. Visual storytelling requires minimal Chinese - pointing, smiling, simple reactions work. User translates key stories. Naturally draws in passive elders who love sharing family history. Creates reciprocal exchange (not one-sided interrogation of girlfriend). Duration: ~30-45 minutes. Recommended by multiple cross-cultural family integration guides.

entertainment.name: Watching CCTV Spring Festival Gala (春晚 Chūnwǎn)
entertainment.notes: 2026 CCTV SPRING FESTIVAL GALA - Broadcasts 8:00 PM on CCTV-1/CCTV-3. Theme: '骐骥驰骋 势不可挡' (Galloping Horses, Year of the Horse). PERFECT FOR LANGUAGE BARRIER: Visual performances (dance, acrobatics, martial arts, traditional opera), minimal dialogue dependency. Features children's performances, ethnic minority songs, robots/modern tech integration - appeals to girlfriend's interests. Can run in background during dumpling-making (8:00-9:30 PM), then focused viewing after (10:15 PM onward). Low-pressure passive activity, everyone watches together, no performance anxiety for girlfriend. User can whisper simple translations of comedy sketches. Authentic CNY tradition shared by 1+ billion viewers - girlfriend experiences real Chinese culture, not manufactured activities.

entertainment.name: Comparing Asian New Year Traditions Discussion (亚洲新年对比 Yàzhōu Xīnnián Duìbǐ)
entertainment.notes: LEVERAGES GIRLFRIEND'S 日韩文化 INTEREST - Natural conversation topic comparing Chinese 春节 vs Japanese 正月 (Shōgatsu) vs Korean 설날 (Seollal). User researches shared traditions beforehand: all three cultures eat special New Year foods (dumplings/mochi/tteokguk), give money gifts (红包/otoshidama/sebaetdon), thorough cleaning before holiday, family reunions. Girlfriend likely knows Japanese/Korean versions from her interests - positions her as CONTRIBUTOR not just receiver, reducing pressure. Visual aids help: show girlfriend photos of Korean rice cake soup or Japanese mochi-making. Creates three-way dialogue (not interrogation): 'In China we do X, in Korea they do Y, in France do you have Z?' Duration: ~20-30 minutes during Gala commercial breaks. Naturally includes elders who appreciate her interest in preserving traditions.

entertainment.name: Midnight Countdown and First Dumplings (守岁 Shǒusuì)
entertainment.notes: 守岁 TRADITION - 'Guarding the Year' - families stay awake to welcome the new year, symbolizes longevity for parents. At midnight (00:00 Feb 17), family eats first dumplings of new year together, sets off small fireworks if permitted in Bazhong. LOW-PRESSURE RITUAL: Simple actions (eating together, watching fireworks), minimal speaking required. Girlfriend participates through presence and shared experience, not performance. User explains simple symbolism: 'Staying awake brings luck to parents' (15-second explanation). Introverted-friendly: focus is on the MOMENT and family togetherness, not individual attention. Natural conclusion to evening - signals rest time approaching. If girlfriend tired from jet lag (Day 1 arrival from Paris 4:40 AM), she can rest earlier without judgment - Chinese families understand exhaustion.

entertainment.name: Seesaw Coffee
entertainment.notes: Pioneer of specialty coffee in China. Sources beans from Yunnan. Modern atmosphere suitable for INFJ preferences.

entertainment.name: Single Origin Roasters
entertainment.notes: Specializes in single-origin Ethiopian beans. Self-roasted. Lattes around 27 RMB. Intimate setting.

entertainment.name: Café on Air
entertainment.notes: Described as perhaps Shanghai's best coffee shop overall. Beautifully made coffee. Hidden gem atmosphere.
